forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 50. Southeast wind 6 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely after 11pm. Cloudy, with a low around 36. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In Boston, the afternoon unfolds with a gentle sun peeking through the clouds, turning the sky into a soft tableau of muted blue. A brisk southeast breeze brushes past, holding whispers of warmth as the city prepares to transition into a chillier evening. As day gives way to night, expect the clouds to thicken, heralding the arrival of rain later on—a somber promise of precipitation that may dampen the air but not the spirits of the city’s inhabitants.

With temperatures reaching a mild 50 degrees, the day invites you to don layers that blend comfort with readiness. A light jacket paired with a cozy scarf will serve well, preparing you for the temperatures that will dip into the 30s tonight. As the evening encroaches, those seeking leisure might consider a quiet stroll through a local park, listening to the rustle of leaves as they dance with the impending drizzle. Alternatively, finding solace in a nearby café, sipping on a steaming cup of tea while watching the world retreat into the comfort of their homes, could be a delightful way to embrace the night. Whatever your choice, Boston’s charming mosaic continues to inspire, even under a cloak of clouds.
